QuickStartEmbed.Title: TaylorBot Quick Start Guide
QuickStartEmbed.Description: Thank you for adding me to your server! Here's a few tips to start 😊

Fields.Name: Spam Channels
Fields.Value: TaylorBot counts user messages in your server (see </server messages:1137547317549998130>). If you have any commands/bots channels, use the </mod spam add:838266590294048778> command in each of them so they don't inflate message counts! 🤖

Fields.Name: Prefix
Fields.Value:
TaylorBot uses slash commands (starting with **/**), but some older commands are still available through prefix commands 💬
The default prefix for TaylorBot is `!`, allowing you to use commands by typing `!help` for example ❗
TaylorBot allows you to change the prefix for your server with "<@119572982178906114> setprefix" command ⚙️

Fields.Name: More Help
Fields.Value: Looking for help or have more questions? Use the </help:1406524374881796239> command or [click here to join the TaylorBot server](https://discord.gg/3qVNd5P) 🆘
